member.summary: Copies the elements of the specified BaseConfigInfo array to the end of the collection.

member.name: M:We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfoCollection.AddRange(We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfoCollection)
member.summary: Adds the contents of another BaseConfigInfoCollection to the end of the collection.
member.param: A BaseConfigInfoCollection containing the Components to add to the collection.

member.name: M:We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfoCollection.Contains(We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfo)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the collection contains the specified BaseConfigInfoCollection.
member.param: The BaseConfigInfoCollection to search for in the collection.
member.returns: true if the collection contains the specified object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfoCollection.CopyTo(We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfo[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the collection Components to a one-dimensional Array instance beginning at the specified index.

The index of the array at which to begin inserting.

member.name: M:We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfoCollection.IndexOf(We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfo)
member.summary: Gets the index in the collection of the specified BaseConfigInfoCollection, if it exists in the collection.
member.param: The BaseConfigInfoCollection to locate in the collection.
member.returns: The index in the collection of the specified object, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the BaseConfigInfoCollection instance.

member.summary:

In C#, this property is the indexer for the BaseConfigInfoCollection class.

member.summary: Supports a simple iteration over a BaseConfigInfoCollection.

member.name: M:We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfoCollection.BaseConfigInfoCollectionEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

member.name: M:We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfoCollection.BaseConfigInfoCollectionEnumerator.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

member.name: P:We7.CMS.Config.BaseConfigInfoCollection.BaseConfigInfoCollectionEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Gets the current element in the collection.
